params.pubId: The publication ID of the publication to query.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

returns._0: bytes Any custom ABI-encoded data. This will be a LensHub event params that can be used by indexers or UIs.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

calculateFee((uint256,uint256,uint256,ad.notice: Calculates and returns the collect fee of a publication.

getBasePublicationData(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the Base publication data for a given publication, or an empty struct if that publication was not initialized with this module.

getPublicationData(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns the publication data for a given publication, or an empty struct if that publication was not initialized with this module.

initializePublicationCollectModule(uint2.notice: Initializes data for a given publication being published.

processCollect((uint256,uint256,uint256,.notice: Processes a collect by:  1. Validating that collect action meets all needed criteria  2. Processing the collect action either with or without referral
